mig.core

Class Enigma

  • java.lang.Object
    • mig.core.Enigma

  • public class Enigma
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Enigme

    This Class creates an Enigma. This enigma gives a question The question can asks an Item or a String If the question is well answered there will be a reward The reward i an Item

    This Class contain :

    • Item : EnigmaItem
    • Answer : String
    • Question : String
    • Reward : Item
    • isResolved :boolean
    • itemWaited : boolean
    Version:
    22/11/16
    Author:
    Group 8

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String answer
      It will contains the answer of the Question If a String is expected
      private boolean isResolved
      This Boolean represents if the Enigma is solved or not It will avoid to win the Enigma more than 1 time
      private EnigmaItem item
      Item is an EnigmaItem : Information or Object It is the object asked by the Enigma
      private boolean itemWaited
      ItemWaited represents if the Enigma wants an Item or a String to solve it
      private java.lang.String npcText
      The text told by the npc when the enigma is resolved
      private java.lang.String question
      This String contains the question asked by the PNJ
      private Item reward
      Reward is the Item gifted if the player has the test.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Enigma()
      Default Constructor This Enigma is just a simple sentence There is no answer waited , and the isResolved is set True Example: the PNJ will only tell a default sentence : Hello, i can not talk to you.
      Enigma(java.lang.String text)
      Default Constructor This Enigma is just a simple sentence There is no answer waited , and the isResolved is set True

      Constructor for an Enigma with an Item as answer
      Enigma(java.lang.String quest, java.lang.String answer, java.lang.String npctext, Item reward)
      Constructor for an Enigma with a String as answer

    • Constructor Detail

      • Enigma

        public Enigma()
        Default Constructor This Enigma is just a simple sentence There is no answer waited , and the isResolved is set True Example: the PNJ will only tell a default sentence : Hello, i can not talk to you. I'm really busy ! "

      • Enigma

        public Enigma(java.lang.String text)
        Default Constructor This Enigma is just a simple sentence There is no answer waited , and the isResolved is set True
        Parameters:
        text - It is the text that you want the enigma told

      • Enigma

        public Enigma(java.lang.String quest,
              EnigmaItem item,
              java.lang.String npctext,
              Item reward)
       throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Constructor for an Enigma with an Item as answer
        Parameters:
        quest - the question asked by the Enigma
        item - the item waited to answer the enigme
        reward - The item won if the enigma is resolved
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the item or the reward are null. The boolean itemWaited will be true because it is an item waited as answer the enigma is set as not resolved.

      • Enigma

        public Enigma(java.lang.String quest,
              java.lang.String answer,
              java.lang.String npctext,
              Item reward)
       throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Constructor for an Enigma with a String as answer
        Parameters:
        quest - the question asked by the Enigma
        answer - the String waited to answer the Enigma
        reward - The item won if the Enigma is resolved
        Throws:
        NullQuestionException - if the question String is empty
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the item or the reward are null. The boolean itemWaited will be false because it is a String waited as answer the enigma is set as not resolved.
